messages.title: A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the real opposition to the Conservative Brexit government. Liberal Democrats are fighting to stop Brexit and build a brighter future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems promise £35 billion for education
Lib Dems pledge to invest in health by putting a penny on income tax

mentions.tacticalSituation: Bath is 1 of 50 seats across the country that can stop the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Lib Dems fighting to stop Brexit.
issues.education: Lib Dems promise £35 billion for education over the next five years.
issues.health: Lib Dems pledge to invest in health by putting a penny on income tax.

quotes.text: The election here is a two-horse race.

images.caption: I'm voting Liberal Democrat to stop the Conservatives.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet contains key messages focusing on stopping Brexit, investments in healthcare and education, and emphasizes the tactical voting situation in Bath as a key battleground.
